backend/main.mo: Defines the Meowate backend canister with access control, blob storage mixin, user profiles, subscriptions, matches, payments, signaling data, and associated in‑memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing WebRTC reliability and diagnostics improvements with referenced frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to their high‑level functional summaries across hooks, pages, and components.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app defining routes, theming, layout components, and authentication‑aware routing initialization.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with cat‑themed branding, copyright text, caffeine.ai link, and simple navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, active user counter, identity controls, and animated cat‑themed UI elements.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Light wrapper that renders the WelcomeAccountSetup component for onboarding.
frontend/src/components/RazorpayConfigMo: Modal component for entering and saving Razorpay API and secret keys, using queries to check and update configuration.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeAccountSe: Multi‑step onboarding dialog for collecting user profile info, preferences, and completing setup with backend mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, subscriptions, friends, KYC, signaling, and other operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebRTC.ts: Manages WebRTC voice connections with state tracking, ICE servers, retries, signaling mutations, and stream handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useYouTubeIFramePlaye: Custom React hook that loads the YouTube IFrame API, initializes a player instance, and exposes play, pause, seek, and time/state helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining light/dark themes, animations, accessibility tweaks, and custom utilities.
frontend/src/lib/youtube.ts: Utilities for parsing YouTube URLs or IDs and generating embed URLs with JS API support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/FriendsPage.tsx: Friends list and chat UI with mock messaging, call actions, and navigation to shared video viewing.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page that handles login, profile checks, and navigation to onboarding or matching.
frontend/src/pages/MatchingPage.tsx: Voice chat matching flow managing WebRTC, authentication guards, user activity, and connection state transitions.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure message with common error reasons and guidance, offering retry and alternative payment suggestions.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies payment status, fetches updated subscription data, and shows plan details with a success animation or error message.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows users to view and edit their profile, update preferences, and complete KYC verification.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx: Shows available subscription plans and handles creating Razorpay orders and initiating payments for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/ViewTogetherPage.tsx: Enables synchronized YouTube watching between peers with shared playback state, video selection, and remote update handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, fonts, shadows, keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state, existing issues, and feature requests for fixing WebRTC connection problems and adding backend matchmaking/presence features.
